NPC.name: prostitute
NPC.description: The girl before you gives you a sultry look, cocking her hip to one side in a well practiced seductive pose that emphasizes her curves and the startling shortness of her skirt. Appearance wise her lips are bright red with lipstick and atop her head a pair of vulpine ears flicks and tips towards you. Her two luxuriously thick and floofy fox tails swishes slowly back and forth as she waits for you to either approach or carry on.
